title: Can VR influencers save the metaverse?
description: Some people think the vision of a virtual world is dead. But others still believe it's the future.

title: Silicon Valley Bank share slump rocks financial markets
description: The four largest US banks, including JP Morgan and Wells Fargo, lost over $50bn of their market value.

title: Is there a better way to insulate our draughty homes?
description: Aerogel is described as the most effective insulating material known to science, so why isn't it used more?
